block.p: The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week:
7-Eleven Inc., Dallas, 10 million shares. Salomon Smith Barney.
The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week:
7-Eleven Inc., Dallas, 10 million shares. Salomon Smith Barney.
Accelerated Networks Inc., Moorpark, Calif., an initial public offering of 4 million shares. Credit Suisse First Boston.
ASCO P.L.C., Aberdeen, Scotland, an initial public offering of 12.5 million American depositary shares, each share represents 5 ordinary shares. Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette.
Basic Energy Services Inc., Midland, Tex., an initial public offering of 3.7 million shares. Prudential Securities.
Charles River Laboratories, Wilmington, Mass., an initial public offering of 12.5 million shares. Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette.
Cepheid, Sunnyvale, Calif., an initial public offering of 5 million shares. UBS Warburg.
ClickSoftware Ltd., Tel Aviv, an initial public offering of 5 million ordinary shares. Lehman Brothers.
Cox Radio Inc., Atlanta, 8 million shares. Credit Suisse First Boston and Morgan Stanley Dean Witter.
Deutsche Telekom A.G., Bonn, 200 million American depositary shares, each shre represents 1 ordinary share. Deutsche Bank Alex. Brown, Dresdner & Goldman, Sachs & Co.
Handspring.com Inc., Mountain View, Calif., an initial public offering of 10 million shares. Credit Suisse First Boston.
Manufacturers' Services Ltd., Concord, Mass., an initial public offering of 11 million shares. Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette.
Parlex Corp., Methuen, Mass., 1.4 million shares. Harkness.
Plantronics Inc., Santa Cruz, Calif., 1 million shares. Merrill Lynch & Co.
Pohang Iron & Steel Co. Ltd., Seoul, South Korea, 23.2 million american depositary shares, each ads represents 1/4 of 1 share. Merrill Lynch & Co.

Silverline Technologies Ltd., Bombay, an initial public offering of 5.2 million American depositary shares, each share represents 2 equity shares, 3.64 million in the United States and Canada. Salomon Smith Barney.

Telefonos de Mexico S.A., Mexico, 27.6 million American depositary shares, each share represents 20 Series L shares, 19 million in the United States and Canada. Salomon Smith Barney and Morgan Stanley Dean Witter.
Valero Energy Corp., San Antonio, 5 million shares. Morgan Stanley Dean Witter.
Vitech America Inc., Miami, 4.2 million shares. Joe Charles.
(Source: MCM EquityWatch.)
